text: Dang mu sa weile wo de huiqi er lai, erqie ta de zhu dui ta shuole hua de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhaoshi wo, yibian wo kanjian ni.” Zhu shuo:“Ni buneng kanjian wo, dan ni kan na zuo shan ba. Ruguo ta neng zai ta de benwei shang jianding, name, ni jiu neng kanjian wo.” Dang ta de zhu dui na zuo shan wei luguang hua de shihou, ta shi na zuo shan bian cheng fensui de. Mu sa yun dao zai dishang. Dang ta suxing de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo zansong ni chaojue wanwu, wo xiang ni huizui, wo shi shouxian xindao de.”
